title: Rubbish
review: Too bad I cannot give this movie a 0. It is worth it!If you are a child or there is something wrong with your brain you will probably enjoy it: --> 'To be honest, I am the target demographic here. I'm a guy in his twenties who plays video games and enjoys fantasy movies and action....'I honestly don't understand why some people like this movie!For me it was a waste of time.
